channel.title: [REWARD] [Delta] Drops turning off
channel.description:
I've been having this problem for a while. I think I've found the file which the problem is occurring. It may be in ItemHandler.class but I'm not sure.
Every few hours the drops turn off. As in, you can't pickup items and when you drop an item, it disappears.
I've tried to get help with this before, but no one attempted to. I'm willing to reward someone cash via PayPal for help that will patch this problem.
Thanks.

item.title: [REWARD] [Delta] Drops turning off
